sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"eksctl"}}>{`EKSCtl`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://eksctl.io/"}}>{`https://eksctl.io/`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"tldr"}}>{`tl;dr`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"clusters"}}>{`Clusters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Action`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Command`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Get cluster`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl get cluster [--name=<name>] [--region=<region>]`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Create cluster`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl create cluster --name=cluster-1 --nodes=4`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Write kubeconfig`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl utils write-kubeconfig --name=<name> [--kubeconfig=<path>] [--set-kubeconfig-context=<bool>]`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Delete cluster`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl delete cluster --name=<name> [--region=<region>]`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"node-groups"}}>{`Node Groups`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Action`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Command`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Get nodegroup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl get nodegroup --cluster=<clusterName> [--name=<nodegroupName>]`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Create nodegroup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl create nodegroup --cluster=<clusterName> [--name=<nodegroupName>]`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Scale nodegroup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl scale nodegroup --cluster=cluster-1 --nodes=5 ng-a345f4e1`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Delete nodegroup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`eksctl delete nodegroup --cluster=<clusterName> --nodes=<desiredCount> --name=<nodegroupName>`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`SSH Access Flag`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`--ssh-access`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Full ECR Access`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`--full-ecr-access`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Enable autoscaling`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`--asg-access`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Once clsuter is running, you'll need to add the autoscaler yourself. See `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/kubernetes/autoscaler/blob/master/cluster-autoscaler/cloudprovider/aws/README.md"}}>{`https://github.com/kubernetes/autoscaler/blob/master/cluster-autoscaler/cloudprovider/aws/README.md`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"creating-a-cluster-using-a-config-file-instead-of-flags"}}>{`Creating a cluster using a config file instead of flags`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can create a cluster using a config file instead of flags.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`First, create cluster.yaml file:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-yaml"}}>{`apiVersion: eksctl.io/v1alpha3
kind: ClusterConfig

metadata:
  name: basic-cluster
  region: eu-north-1

nodeGroups:
  - name: ng-1
    instanceType: m5.large
    desiredCapacity: 10
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Next, run this command:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-shell"}}>{`eksctl create cluster -f cluster.yaml
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This will create a cluster as described.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If you needed to use an existing VPC, you can use a config file like this:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-yaml"}}>{`apiVersion: eksctl.io/v1alpha3
kind: ClusterConfig

metadata:
  name: cluster-in-existing-vpc
  region: eu-north-1

vpc:
  subnets:
    private:
      eu-north-1a: {id: subnet-0ff156e0c4a6d300c}
      eu-north-1b: {id: subnet-0549cdab573695c03}
      eu-north-1c: {id: subnet-0426fb4a607393184}

nodeGroups:
  - name: ng-1-workers
    labels: {role: workers}
    instanceType: m5.xlarge
    desiredCapacity: 10
    privateNetworking: true
  - name: ng-2-builders
    labels: {role: builders}
    instanceType: m5.2xlarge
    desiredCapacity: 2
    privateNetworking: true
    iam:
      withAddonPolicies:
        imageBuilder: true
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`See `}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://github.com/weaveworks/eksctl/tree/master/examples","alt":"examples/"}}></MDXTag>{` directory for more sample config files.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To download the latest release, run:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-shell"}}>{`curl --silent --location "https://github.com/weaveworks/eksctl/releases/download/latest_release/eksctl_\$(uname -s)_amd64.tar.gz" | tar xz -C /tmp
sudo mv /tmp/eksctl /usr/local/bin
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Alternatively, macOS users can use Homebrew:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-shell"}}>{`brew install weaveworks/tap/eksctl
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You will need to have AWS API credentials configured. What works for AWS CLI or any other tools (kops, Terraform etc), should be sufficient. You can use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`~/.aws/credentials`}</MDXTag>{` file or environment variables. For more information read AWS documentation.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`To create a basic cluster, run:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-shell"}}>{`eksctl create cluster
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A cluster will be created with default parameters:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Exciting auto-generated name, e.g. "fabulous-mushroom-1527688624"`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`2x m5.large nodes (this instance type suits most common use-cases, and is good value for money)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Use official AWS EKS AMI`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`us-west-2`}</MDXTag>{` region`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Dedicated VPC (check your quotas)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Using static AMI resolver`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"example-output"}}>{`Example output`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-shell"}}>{`\$ eksctl create cluster
[]  using region us-west-2
[]  setting availability zones to [us-west-2c us-west-2a us-west-2b]
[]  subnets for us-west-2c - public:192.168.0.0/19 private:192.168.96.0/19
[]  subnets for us-west-2a - public:192.168.32.0/19 private:192.168.128.0/19
[]  subnets for us-west-2b - public:192.168.64.0/19 private:192.168.160.0/19
[]  using "ami-0ce0ec06e682ee10e" for nodes
[]  creating EKS cluster "floral-unicorn-1540567338" in "us-west-2" region
[]  will create 2 separate CloudFormation stacks for cluster itself and the initial nodegroup
[]  if you encounter any issues, check CloudFormation console or try 'eksctl utils describe-stacks --region=us-west-2 --name=floral-unicorn-1540567338'
[]  creating cluster stack "eksctl-floral-unicorn-1540567338-cluster"
[]  creating nodegroup stack "eksctl-floral-unicorn-1540567338-nodegroup-ng-39d54824"
[]  all EKS cluster resource for "floral-unicorn-1540567338" had been created
[]  saved kubeconfig as "~/.kube/config"
[]  nodegroup "ng-39d54824" has 0 nodes
[]  waiting for at least 2 nodes to become ready
[]  nodegroup "ng-39d54824" has 2 nodes
[]  node "ip-192-168-71-20.us-west-2.compute.internal" is ready
[]  node "ip-192-168-25-215.us-west-2.compute.internal" is ready
[]  kubectl command should work with "~/.kube/config", try 'kubectl get nodes'
[]  EKS cluster "floral-unicorn-1540567338" in "us-west-2" region is ready
\$
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
